forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain developing after midnight. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
